channel.title: Carl Müller-Crepon and [Clara Neupert-Wentz](https://pure.au.dk/portal/en/persons/clara-emilia-edith-neupertwentz(70211ce4-1834-4222-9ffd-dd8dbac31d11).html) on Carl Müller-Crepon
channel.description: Recent content in Carl Müller-Crepon and [Clara Neupert-Wentz](https://pure.au.dk/portal/en/persons/clara-emilia-edith-neupertwentz(70211ce4-1834-4222-9ffd-dd8dbac31d11).html) on Carl Müller-Crepon

item.title: Rulers on the Road: Itinerant Rule and Delegation as Substitutes in the Holy Roman Empire, AD 751–1519
item.description: We study the strategic geography of the itineraries of the emperors of the Holy Roman Empire.
